night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Light rain in many places. Locally fog. Variable wind 1-7 m/s. Air temperature +1..+7, under clear skies -1°C possible, on coast up to 9°C.
night.sea:
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 Sep 25 to 19:00 UTC Sep 26, 2022.
Warnings: Northern Baltic: by day southeast, south increasing 12, in gusts up to 17 m/s. Wave height 1-2.5 m.
Weather summary: southeastern part of Low spreading to the Baltic Sea from Scandinavia.
Northern Baltic: southerly 4-9, in gusts up to 12 m/s, by day southeast, south 6-12, in gusts up to 17 m/s. Wave height by day 1-2.5 m. Rain in many places, locally thunder possible. Visibility from good to moderate.
Western Gulf of Finland, Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: variable 1-7 m/s, by morning becoming southerly 3-9 m/s, by day southeast, south 3-8, in gusts up to 12 m/s. Locally rain showers. At night locally fog possible, otherwise visibility from good to moderate.
Eastern Gulf of Finland: variable 1-7 m/s. Rain. Visibility moderate.
night.peipsi: Variable wind 1-4 m/s. Wave height up to 0.3 m. At times rain. Visibility moderate, towards morning fog possible. Air temperature 5..8°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Locally light rain. In the evening the sky is clearing up. Easterly wind 2-8, on islands in gusts 11 m/s. Air temperature 10..15°C.
day.peipsi: Southeast, south wind, around evening easterly wind 2-6 m/s. Wave height up to 0.5 m. Drizzle possible. Visibility moderate or good. Air temperature 10..12°C.

night.text: Slightly and partly cloudy. Mainly dry. Fog in many places. Easterly wind 2-8, on islands in gusts up to 12 m/s. Air temperature -1..+6, on coast up to 11°C.

day.text: Variable clouds. Locally rain. Easterly wind 2-8, on islands in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature 11..15°C.

night.text: Variable clouds. Rain in many places. Easterly wind 2-8, on islands in gusts 11 m/s. Air temperature 2..7, on coast up to 11°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain in many places. East, northeast wind 5-10, on islands and coast in gusts 15 m/s. Air temperature 9..14°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Locally rain. East, northeast wind 5-10, on islands and coast in gusts 15, in the morning up to 18 m/s. Air temperature 3..8, on coast up to 11°C.

day.text: Overcast, towards evening locally clear spells. Rain. Northeast, east wind 5-12, on islands and coast in gusts 15-18 m/s, towards evening decreasing southeast, south wind 4-10 m/s. Air temperature 8..13°C.
